text: It's not just you. I tested and can't remove a campaign either, only select another.
Any agency partner want to share any cons of HubSpot agency partner program or if they think they are just trying to sell HubSpot or you think they really support their partners so they grow better ?
The support we get being a HubSpot partner is next level! Absolutely no cons - only pros.

That’s the same experience that the other partner agencies we work with have echoed.

I’ve only heard 1 bad situation where the agency’s rep was hard to get ahold of and didn’t seem to be able to dedicate time to the agency. That however was fixed a new rep was assigned to them and they were pretty satisfied. Based on what I’ve heard in the community I think the norm is that they go above and beyond what you’d expect them to.
thanks <@U2H1Q3F8R> and <@U7SL518D6>, i have my same assumption based on my community experience so far!!

Spacesword was the internal name of the UX redesign that happened a year or two ago.  We launched it as Canvas <https://canvas.HubSpot.com/> externally (and since started calling it internally as well).  Fun little anecdote.  After something had be redesigned no one was sure what the past tense of “space sword” should be.  It became “space stabbed”
love it, thanks for the back-story
It there a way to target a menu item in a custom menu module and display two different dropdowns? loop.first works but can I target 2nd / 3rd elements? loop.second / loop.third???

Hey guys!
I just wanted to confirm something.
I noticed that using Staging page, when publishing it, a form and CTA could end up on a 404 by trying to access the old page version’s ID as the new “version” of the page seems to have a new ID.
Did i mess something up, or is it the behavior?

For exemple. I pushed those 2 pages yesterday to replace the current ones.
Those 2 pages were the destination page of 2 form (FR and EN) “Watch a video”, which went to a 404 name “/thank-you/chronogolf-video-archived” after the push.

Feel like it isn’t the intended behavior?

i'm wondering if there's a way to access workflow inside HubSpot dynamic template ? just like forms api
hbspt.forms is there something like hbspt.workflows?
